text-muted: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

text-muted: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

name: Raging Bull
text-muted: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: Rush
text-muted: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

text-muted: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

text-muted: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

text-muted: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

text-muted: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.
